subject: College Athletics
Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers Coach C. Vivian Stringer, a college basketball lifer, has endured many a personal blow across 37 years at three schools while maintaining the audacity of hope.
snippet: Rutgers Coach C. Vivian Stringer, a college basketball lifer, has endured many a personal blow across 37 years at three schools while maintaining the audacity of hope.
